title: If I audition for a K-pop agency with a harder dance choreography, will it affect my results positively? - Quora

response.answer_text: no. difficulty doesn’t matter. in fact if you did an easy dance smoothly with the right energy and facial expressions, they’d prefer that over a stiff, sloppy, less energetic attempt at a harder one. it all matters on how well you execute it, now how much you can do. doing something that’s too hard might also make you look like a try hard. do something you’re comfortable with, make it natural, don’t look like you’re putting any effort into it but don’t make it look like you’re not trying.
